panels.title: Overview (updates based on top time selection)

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT sum(requests) as requests
    , count(distinct client_ip) as visitors
    , sum(case when elb_status_code_group = '1xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_1xx
    , sum(case when elb_status_code_group = '2xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_2xx
    , sum(case when elb_status_code_group = '3xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_3xx
    , sum(case when elb_status_code_group = '4xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_4xx
    , sum(case when elb_status_code_group = '5xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_5xx
    , sum(received_bytes) as received_bytes
    , sum(sent_bytes) as sent_bytes
    , avg(avg_request_processing_time) filter (where avg_request_processing_time is not null) as avg_request_processing_time
    , avg(avg_target_processing_time) filter (where avg_target_processing_time is not null) as avg_target_processing_time
    , avg(avg_response_processing_time) filter (where avg_response_processing_time is not null) as avg_response_processing_time
FROM "$__table"
WHERE request_host IN (${host:sqlstring}) 
    AND type IN (${type:sqlstring}) 
    AND elb_status_code_group IN (${elb_status_code_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND target_group_arn IN (${target_group_arn:sqlstring}) 
    AND request_verb IN (${http_method:sqlstring})
    AND request_path LIKE '${request_path}%'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))

SELECT $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') as time
    , sum(case when elb_status_code_group = '1xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_1xx
    , sum(case when elb_status_code_group = '2xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_2xx
    , sum(case when elb_status_code_group = '3xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_3xx
    , sum(case when elb_status_code_group = '4xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_4xx
    , sum(case when elb_status_code_group = '5xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_5xx
    , sum(received_bytes) as received_bytes
    , sum(sent_bytes) as sent_bytes
    , avg(avg_request_processing_time) as avg_request_processing_time
    , avg(avg_target_processing_time) as avg_target_processing_time
    , avg(avg_response_processing_time) as avg_response_processing_time
    , sum(requests) as requests
    , count(distinct client_ip) as visitors
FROM "$__table"
WHERE request_host IN (${host:sqlstring}) 
    AND type IN (${type:sqlstring}) 
    AND elb_status_code_group IN (${elb_status_code_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND target_group_arn IN (${target_group_arn:sqlstring}) 
    AND request_verb IN (${http_method:sqlstring})
    AND request_path LIKE '${request_path}%'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}');

SELECT target_ip, elb_status_code, request_verb, ssl_protocol, sum(requests) as requests
FROM "$__table"
WHERE request_host IN (${host:sqlstring}) 
    AND type IN (${type:sqlstring}) 
    AND elb_status_code_group IN (${elb_status_code_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND target_group_arn IN (${target_group_arn:sqlstring}) 
    AND request_verb IN (${http_method:sqlstring})
    AND request_path LIKE '${request_path}%'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY target_ip, elb_status_code, request_verb, ssl_protocol

SELECT request_host, request_path, SUM(requests) as requests
FROM "$__table"
WHERE request_host IN (${host:sqlstring}) 
    AND type IN (${type:sqlstring}) 
    AND elb_status_code_group IN (${elb_status_code_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND target_group_arn IN (${target_group_arn:sqlstring}) 
    AND request_verb IN (${http_method:sqlstring})
    AND request_path LIKE '${request_path}%'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
    OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY request_host, request_path
ORDER BY requests DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT client_ip, SUM(requests) as requests
FROM "$__table"
WHERE request_host IN (${host:sqlstring}) 
    AND type IN (${type:sqlstring}) 
    AND elb_status_code_group IN (${elb_status_code_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND target_group_arn IN (${target_group_arn:sqlstring}) 
    AND request_verb IN (${http_method:sqlstring})
    AND request_path LIKE '${request_path}%'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
    OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY client_ip
ORDER BY requests DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT request_host, request_path, avg(avg_request_processing_time) as avg_request_processing_time
FROM "$__table"
WHERE avg_request_processing_time is not null 
    AND request_host IN (${host:sqlstring}) 
    AND type IN (${type:sqlstring}) 
    AND elb_status_code_group IN (${elb_status_code_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND target_group_arn IN (${target_group_arn:sqlstring}) 
    AND request_verb IN (${http_method:sqlstring})
    AND request_path LIKE '${request_path}%'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
    OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY request_host, request_path
ORDER BY avg_request_processing_time DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT request_host, request_path, sum(requests) as requests
FROM "$__table"
WHERE elb_status_code_group = '5xx'
    AND request_host IN (${host:sqlstring}) 
    AND type IN (${type:sqlstring}) 
    AND target_group_arn IN (${target_group_arn:sqlstring}) 
    AND request_verb IN (${http_method:sqlstring})
    AND request_path LIKE '${request_path}%'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
    OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY request_host, request_path
ORDER BY requests DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT timestamp, type, client_ip, client_port, target_ip
    , target_port, request_processing_time, target_processing_time
    , response_processing_time, elb_status_code, target_status_code
    , received_bytes, sent_bytes, request_verb, request_url
    , request_host, request_path, request_proto, user_agent
    , ssl_cipher, target_group_arn, trace_id, domain_name
    , chosen_cert_arn, matched_rule_priority, request_creation_time
    , actions_executed, redirect_url, lambda_error_reason
    , target_port_list, target_status_code_list, classification
    , classification_reason
FROM "$__table"
where elb_status_code_group in ('4xx', '5xx')
    AND request_host IN (${host:sqlstring}) 
    AND type IN (${type:sqlstring})
    AND target_group_arn IN (${target_group_arn:sqlstring}) 
    AND request_verb IN (${http_method:sqlstring})
    AND request_path LIKE '${request_path}%'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 500;

SELECT ua_os, ua_device, ua_browser, ua_category, geo_iso_code, geo_country, geo_city
	, sum(requests) as requests
FROM "$__table"
WHERE request_host IN (${host:sqlstring}) 
    AND type IN (${type:sqlstring}) 
    AND elb_status_code_group IN (${elb_status_code_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND target_group_arn IN (${target_group_arn:sqlstring}) 
    AND request_verb IN (${http_method:sqlstring})
    AND request_path LIKE '${request_path}%'
	AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
  AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY ua_os, ua_device, ua_browser, ua_category, geo_iso_code, geo_country, geo_city

list.allValue: SELECT request_host FROM "$__table" WHERE  event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH') 	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00') GROUP BY request_host
list.label: Host
list.name: host

query.rawSQL:
SELECT request_host
FROM "$__table"
WHERE  event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00')
GROUP BY request_host

list.label: Request Type
list.name: type
list.query: http, https, h2, grpcs, ws, wss

list.label: HTTP Method
list.name: http_method
list.query: GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, HEAD, PATCH, OPTIONS

list.allValue: SELECT target_group_arn FROM "$__table" WHERE  event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH') 	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00') GROUP BY target_group_arn
list.label: Target Group ARN
list.name: target_group_arn

query.rawSQL:
SELECT target_group_arn
FROM "$__table"
WHERE  event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00')
GROUP BY target_group_arn
